passives.name: Stormraider
passives.effects: Dealing damage to an enemy champion equal to 25% of their maximum health within 2.5s seconds inflicts them with Squall (30 second cooldown, starts on Squall's application).

passives.name: Squall
passives.effects: After 2 seconds of having applied Squall, strike the target with lightning, dealing 125% attack speed (+ 10% AP) magic damage to them. If the target dies before being struck, they emit an electric field instantly that shocks all enemy champions near them, dealing them the same damage.
